channel.title: How Do I add items for a shopkeeper to sell?
channel.description:
i made a shopkeeper in my server's begining area and i wanted to sell bronze , iron , steel , black, mith, etc... armor... can anyone help me add these items to the shop?
thanks
-joey

item.title: How Do I add items for a shopkeeper to sell?
item.dc:creator: @Pasta325 Pasta325
item.description:
@Pasta325 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]In the server’s client class, search for “WanneShop” you should see something like:

if(NPCID == NPC_ID) {
      PutNPCCoords = true;
      WanneShop = NPC_SHOP_ID; 
}

The constant ‘NPC_ID’ is the ID of the shop keeper.
The constant ‘NPC_SHOP_ID’ is the ID of the shop to which it opens.

Now, in shops.cfg, you should see something like:

shop = NPC_SHOP_ID	THE_SHOP_NAME				2	2	ITEM_ID	AMOUNT	ITEM_ID	AMOUNT

The constant ‘NPC_SHOP_ID’ is the ID of the shop to which the NPC is opening.
The constant ‘THE_SHOP_NAME’ is the shop name, displayed at the top of each shop.
The constant ‘ITEM_ID’ is the ID of the item in the shop.
The constant ‘AMOUNT’ is the amount of that item in the shop.[/quote]

okay imma try that out now thanks a bunch!

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I add items for a shopkeeper to sell?
